txt.en: 'No, no! Get away from me! If they see me speaking to outsiders, they will torture me more!'
'You... [placeholder]. You will be the instrument of my revenge! Come closer. I will tell you everything!'
'She has crafted a second Great Plague, and means to drop it on your homelands. She almost has enough.'
'There is no cure, but you can destroy her chemical cauldrons before she can release it. It will take her decades to make more.'
'She keeps the cauldrons near her throne room, deep in Seregost, guarded by her deadliest spawn.'
'I tell you this so you can thwart her plans and destroy her! Be forever accursed, Lhaereth the Stained! May these westerners give you what you deserve!'
'That is all I know. Go now. Leave me to die.'
'Good, I made it! I decided I couldn't just walk away after I wasn't able to help during the battle for Kala-gijak. It would bring shame to the Rangers of Ithilien!'
Viznak drops the rope from above
Rhadrog is right next to you!\n\nYou should talk to Rhadrog.
'No! You shall not interfere! You will not steal him from us again!'
'You save me again?! We gonna be the best of friends forever now!'
'I used to be the captain of Kala-gijak. When Sauron fell, Lhaereth came to me, demanding I swear myself to her.'
'I would not! She did nothing to help on the Fields of Pelennor, and she did nothing to help at the Black Gate! Uruk-hai owe her nothing!'
'And what did I get for my years of loyalty to the Dark Lord? That coward, Brogmaush, made a deal with Lhaereth, and betrayed me! I was taken here, and subjected to her experiments...'
Living prisoners can be found inside the prison.\n\nYou should talk to these prisoners.
Viznak is somewhere deeper in the prison.\n\nNow that you have the information you need, you should find Viznak.
The Blood-witch can be found in the deepest chamber of Seregost's prison.\n\nYou should defeat the Blood-witch and her merrevail.
Bolvág the Cursed is chasing you!\n\nYou should run!
You have managed to escape with Rhadrog and Viznak.\n\nYou should talk to Rhadrog.
Viznak can be found near Seregost.\n\nYou should talk to Viznak.
Viznak has been ambushed by merrevail on Seregost's terrace!\n\nYou should defeat the merrevail.
Viznak has been taken into Seregost.\n\nYou should find a way inside.
The merrevail have Viznak tied to an altar
Rhadrog is standing by inside the prison.\n\nYou should talk to Rhadrog.
You and Viznak are prepared to enter Seregost. What secrets and what dangers can be found within?
Bolvág the Cursed roars behind you, but you are safe for now
Living prisoners can be found inside the prison.\n\nYou should talk to these prisoners.
TBD Go to Agarnaith Ranger Camp

'What... what is this place? Ugh, that stench! I have a feeling these cells do not all contain living beings. We need to find Viznak quickly and get out of here!\n\n'No, no, I am letting my fears win and forgetting the mission! We need to find information on the plague first, rescue Viznak second. Let's see if any of these prisoners are alive and willing to speak to us.'
Screams and moans from many different creatures echo around in the chamber before you

'These poor men... Lhaereth must be subjecting them to her plague.  If we cannot get any information out of them, we may need to extract some from these Orcs and goblins...\n\n'That Uruk over there still looks aware. We don't have anything to lose; let's try talking to him.'
'Right, here's the plan. Get in, get shinies, get out before Blight Lady gets home.\n\n'You ready? I'm ready! Let's do this!'
'Please tell me you're ready to get out of here!'
'That was the biggest troll I have ever seen! Let's get back to Viznak's hideout before it finds another way out!'
'Well, not what I had in mind, but happy to help however I can.'
'Ok, really, really gonna go now! Will drop the rope when I get there.'
'I'll follow them! Take out these Merrevail!'
'Over here! They went in this door!'
'I think he's in too much pain to say anything else...'
'He's terrified! What is she doing to these people?'
'The pain! So much pain... I was always loyal to Lord Sauron. Why is this happening? Curse that wretched Lhaereth!'
'That's the information we needed! Let's find Viznak and get out of here!'
